name: @steve9164/test-npm-publish
description: Test automated publishing to npm using GitHub Actions

scripts.postpublish: bash -c "if [ -z "$GITHUB_TOKEN" ]; then git tag -a ${npm_package_version} -m "${npm_package_version}" && git push origin ${npm_package_version}; else echo 'got token'; fi "

author: Stephen Davies <steve9164@gmail.com>
